about_the_game:
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles, and waffles using your creativity in one of the best dessert decorating games!

Experience the satisfaction of preparing your customers' orders with your own hands, meeting their expectations, and witnessing their delightful reactions! Explore a variety of delicious molds, creams, syrups, and sweet ingredients to create mouthwatering works of art!




Does your customer want to take revenge on someone? Prepare yucky desserts with surprise bugs or chili peppers! Such a taste is definitely something no one will ever forget!

Every dessert sold brings you coins, a delightful reward that you can invest in enhancing the appearance of your store. Change the colors of your walls or floor, and add new furniture. Transform your store into a cozy and professional haven, all while having fun!

Ready to get your hands dirty and make unique, colorful desserts?

Features:

  • Pick up a dessert of your choice
  • Experiment with flavor
  • Enjoy all kinds of decoration tools
  • Make a combo with ingredients, syrup, frosting, etc.
  • Get creative with decorative toppings
  • Upgrade your sweet shop by selling delicious desserts to customers
